The operation acquires a lease on the file.
If the file does not have an active lease, the File service creates a lease on the file and returns it. If the file has an active lease, you can only request a new lease using the active lease ID as
Docs.remarks: A will be thrown if a failure occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Azure.Response<Azure.Storage.Files.Shares.Models.ShareFileLease> Break (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Azure.Response`1<class Azure.Storage.Files.Shares.Models.ShareFileLease> Break(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Break (Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Response(Of ShareFileLease)

abstract member Break : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.Response<Azure.Storage.Files.Shares.Models.ShareFileLease> override this.Break : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.Response<Azure.Storage.Files.Shares.Models.ShareFileLease>

Docs.param: Optional to propagate notifications that the operation should be cancelled.
Docs.summary:
The operation breaks the files's previously-acquired lease (if it exists).
Once a lease is broken, it cannot be renewed. Any authorized request can break the lease; the request is not required to specify a matching lease ID.
A lease that has been broken can also be released. A client can immediately acquire a file lease that has been released.
Docs.remarks: A will be thrown if a failure occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Azure.Response<Azure.Storage.Files.Shares.Models.FileLeaseReleaseInfo> Release (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Azure.Response`1<class Azure.Storage.Files.Shares.Models.FileLeaseReleaseInfo> Release(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

Docs.param: Optional to propagate notifications that the operation should be cancelled.
Docs.summary:
The operation releases the files's previously-acquired lease.
The lease may be released if the matches that associated with the file. Releasing the lease allows another client to immediately acquire the lease for the file as soon as the release is complete.
Docs.returns: A describing the updated blob or container.
Docs.remarks: A will be thrown if a failure occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Azure.Response<Azure.Storage.Files.Shares.Models.ShareFileLease> Renew (System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = default);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Azure.Response`1<class Azure.Storage.Files.Shares.Models.ShareFileLease> Renew(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Overridable Function Renew (Optional cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Response(Of ShareFileLease)

abstract member Renew : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.Response<Azure.Storage.Files.Shares.Models.ShareFileLease> override this.Renew : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> Azure.Response<Azure.Storage.Files.Shares.Models.ShareFileLease>

Docs.param: Optional to propagate notifications that the operation should be cancelled.
Docs.summary:
The operation renews the shares's previously-acquired lease. This API does not support files.
The lease can be renewed if the leaseId matches that associated with the share. Note that the lease may be renewed even if it has expired as long as the share has not been leased again since the expiration of that lease. When you renew a lease, the lease duration clock resets.
Docs.remarks: A will be thrown if a failure occurs.

Docs.param: Optional to propagate notifications that the operation should be cancelled.
Docs.summary:
The operation renews the shares's previously-acquired lease. This API does not support files.
The lease can be renewed if the leaseId matches that associated with the share. Note that the lease may be renewed even if it has expired as long as the share has not been leased again since the expiration of that lease. When you renew a lease, the lease duration clock resets.
Docs.remarks: A will be thrown if a failure occurs.
